summary: March 20 is the 79th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
March 20 is the 79th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar. There are 286 days remaining until the end of the year.
Typically the March equinox falls on this date, marking the vernal point in the Northern Hemisphere and the autumnal point in the Southern Hemisphere, when both day and night are of equal length.
title: March 20
